text: The Gamma variant, also known as lineage P.1, is one of the variants of SARS- CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19. This variant of SARS-CoV-2 was first detected by the National Institute of Infectious Diseases (NIID) of Japan, on 6 January 2021 in four people who had arrived in Tokyo having visited Amazonas, Brazil, four days earlier. ==Notes== ==References== Category:COVID-19 pandemic
title: SARS-CoV-2 Gamma variant
